title: Looking For A Casual Club
body:
Heyyo I'm looking for people that enjoy playing the game but also don't take it too seriously. Ranked, normals, idc as long as you're not toxic lol.

I'm normally an ADC/Supp main but I don't think this meta is for me {{item:3070}} 

IGN; Fresh Graduate

so yeeahh add meee.

replies.body: edit: Hey man, i own a group that has around 60 members if your interested.. just add me ingame

> [{quoted}](name=terrythebeast,realm=OCE,application-id=NjEElsTI,discussion-id=ky7xO73E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-27T13:21:58.606+0000)
>
> edit: Hey man, i own a group that has around 60 members if your interested.. just add me ingame

can i join :)
Hey can i join as well? I'm just looking for a casual club to represent.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

> [{quoted}](name=terrythebeast,realm=OCE,application-id=NjEElsTI,discussion-id=ky7xO73E,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-04T06:07:58.634+0000)
>
> yea sure no worries

Hey can I join too please? I know it says I'm a low level but I owned a level 30 account about a year ago. :P But hopefully my level doesn't matter in the first place.
Club GTR is for you bro! https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/RtnVHEA0-club-gtr-looking-for-casual-players?show=flat&page=5
